name: dressing_startCourse
description: This function is used to start a clothing management course on a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to start the course.

parameters.name: predefinedMode
parameters.description: The predefined mode to start (e.g., standard, rapid, sterilization, fine dust).

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode to start (e.g., standard, rapid, sterilization, fine dust).
